attributes.action: The introduction of a “Plastics Usage License”.
attributes.additional_details: This will result in: 1. A massive reduction in plastics waste, which is polluting our environment. 2. A responsible attitude, supported by “Law” towards pollution of the environment. 3. The “Responsible and Reasonable” use of resources.
attributes.background: There are many unnecessary uses such as wrappings and packaging which are used then dumped, there are many alternatives to plastic in packaging.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure what you mean by a “Plastics Usage License”.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
